content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully created on the map. The agent made several attempts to establish a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs to research; however, placement and crafting failures (due to missing inventory and insufficient resources) prevented the Lab from being established. In addition, while smelting operations were carried out using furnaces located at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) for iron and Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0) for copper, these facilities were pre-existing and not newly constructed by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
• API Misuse in get_entities Calls
 - Avoid using unsupported keyword arguments (such as ‘radius’) and extra positional arguments. Ensure that the function call strictly matches the defined signature.
• Iteration on Nonexistent Entity Lists
 - Check that the result from get_entities (or equivalent functions) is not None before attempting to iterate or filter the returned data.
• Lab Placement and Crafting Failures
 - Verify the availability of a Lab in inventory before attempting its placement.
 - Confirm that all prerequisite sub-ingredients (e.g., iron-plate required for iron-gear-wheel, copper-plate for copper-cable, electronic-circuit components, etc.) are sufficiently available before initiating Lab crafting.
• Resource Shortages Affecting Production
 - Ensure that the supply chain (including smelting operations and component production) meets the required resource quota to support complex builds such as the Lab.
